name: Piyush Pandey,

description: Generating Human Faces in an unsupervised way with the help of WGAN using pytorch lightning framework

name: Chirag Jain
description: A campus portal that provides a Market Hub with some unique features of ‘unrestricted bidding’ and ‘product verification’. It allows the students to upload and sell their old products, on which other students can place bids within a range allowed by the seller.

name: Rishabh Tiwari,

Rishabh Aggarwal,
Nainesh Hulke
description: AI based medical app-web platform for prognosis of severe yet curable diseases like Diabetic Retinopathy, Brain Tumor, Skin Cancer, etc.

name: Sandeep Kumar Auddy
description: Pantomath is a quizing website where one can challenge other users. Both the users will be given 5 random questions. The winner will be awareded with an increase in their rank (depending upon noth the margin of win, and the difference of rank between the two players)
